snippet: Brian Stelter on ratings decline worries at CNN; boom time for the business of going broke; and Catherine Rampell on being derailed from a fast-track legal career at Dewey & LeBoeuf.
abstract: Brian Stelter on ratings decline worries at CNN; boom time for the business of going broke; and Catherine Rampell on being derailed from a fast-track legal career at Dewey & LeBoeuf.

headline.main: Business Day Live: Law Students Derailed on Fast Track
